entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 1:30 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNE 54 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
